text: The Miami Grand Prix is a Formula One race that was first held in the 2022 season. The race takes place at the Miami International Autodrome and has a ten-year contract. == Winners == ===Repeat winners (drivers)=== Drivers in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Driver Years won 2 Max Verstappen 2022, 2023 Source: Source: Source: Source: === Repeat winners (constructors) === Teams in bold are competing in the Formula One championship in the current season. Wins Constructor Years won 2 Red Bull Racing 2022, 2023 Source: Source: Source: Source: ===By year=== All Miami Grands Prix were held at the Miami International Autodrome. title: Miami Grand Prix
